com.magnitude.gui
Class Cursor

java.lang.Object
  View
      com.magnitude.ARKitapi.MagnitudeStaticView
          com.magnitude.gui.Cursor

public class Cursor
extends MagnitudeStaticView

Cursor is used to draw the cursor (what you can see moving) for the slidebar.

Author:
Magnitude Client

draw

public void draw(Canvas c,
                 boolean inSlide,
                 float distance,
                 RectF rect)
Draw the cursor on screen. The tricky math modification is because we use a 3*screen height image. According to the position the part of the cursor to draw under the slide bar shadow changed.

Parameters:
c - the canvas
inSlide - used to draw a small box with actual value of the distance filter
distance - if inSlide, it's the value to draw
rect - The rectangle where to draw
